A very original FPS singleplayer game with an entertaining story and some puzzle elements to it. It somehow reminded me of Goldeneye for the N64 although the two are still very different games. This game's age doesn't really show and you can tell this one has great production value. I had plenty of fun playing through the story on normal and hard (it's about 15 hours).
